summary: Tested User Profile Management UI and Age Gate web date picker fix. All features working correctly. Backend: 13/13 profile tests passed. Frontend: Age gate HTML date input works, profile edit page fully functional, Account page shows profile card with name/email/phone, Cloudz Points balance with tier badge, redemption history.
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_profile_* test users for backend API testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Profile management fully working. Age gate HTML date picker works on web. Account page shows all profile info, Cloudz balance, tier badge, redemption history. Profile edit allows editing first/last name, email, phone. Admin Dashboard and Cloudz navigation working.
verified_features: Age Gate: HTML date input on web shows mm/dd/yyyy placeholder, date selection updates state
Age Gate: Selecting 21+ date (1990) and clicking Verify navigates to /auth/login
Age Gate: Selecting under 21 date (2010) shows 'Access Denied' alert, stays on age-gate
Account Page: Profile card shows name, email, phone, avatar with initials
Account Page: Cloudz Points balance displayed (5,500)
Account Page: Silver Storm tier badge displayed (highest unlocked tier)
Account Page: Recent Redemptions section shows Bronze Cloud redemptions (Active/Used status)
Account Page: Cloudz Points card navigates to /cloudz
Account Page: Cloudz Rewards menu navigates to /cloudz
Account Page: Admin Dashboard navigates to /admin/orders
Profile Edit: Page loads with user data (first name, last name, email, phone)
Profile Edit: Avatar shows initials with camera icon for photo change
Profile Edit: Can edit phone field, Save button enables after editing
Profile Edit: PATCH /api/profile updates phone correctly
Profile Edit: After save, shows success alert and navigates back to Account
Profile Edit: Phone number persists and shows on Account page
Backend: PATCH /api/profile updates firstName, lastName, email, phone, profilePhoto

notes.data_testid_issue: Some data-testid attributes not being detected in React Native Web, but selectors work with text/CSS selectors
notes.direct_navigation: Navigating directly via URL (page.goto /profile) may not preserve auth state - use in-app SPA navigation for proper flow testing
notes.image_upload: Profile photo upload via expo-image-picker not tested in headless browser (as per instructions)
